products.name: Cinema Lighting Kit
products.description: Portable LED three-point kit for on-location shoots.
products.fullDescription: A travel-ready LED kit with key, fill, and back lights, diffusion, and stands. Perfect for music videos and interviews.
products.story: Lencho’s go-to compact kit for fast setups in tight locations.

products.name: Field Audio Recorder
products.description: 4-channel recorder with XLR inputs for clean production sound.
products.fullDescription: Capture dialogue and ambience with dual SD slots, 32-bit float recording, and timecode-ready workflow.
products.story: Used across Lencho’s music videos to keep vocals and dialogue crisp even in noisy streets.

products.name: Boom Mic Kit
products.description: Shotgun mic with shock mount, wind protection, and carbon boom.
products.fullDescription: Lightweight carbon boom pole, supercardioid mic, blimp, and deadcat for exterior shoots.
products.story: Lencho’s standard kit for dialogue on set and behind-the-scenes coverage.

products.name: Portable LED Panel
products.description: Bi-color LED with battery plate for quick accent lighting.
products.fullDescription: Dimmable, lightweight panel with softbox and grid for controlled highlights in music videos and interviews.
products.story: Great for eye lights and quick edge lighting when Lencho needs speed.

products.name: Director Slate
products.fullDescription: Durable slate with colored sticks and dry-erase surface. Helps sync audio and picture fast on multi-cam shoots.
products.story: Standard on Lencho’s sets to keep post-production organized.

products.name: Lens Cleaning Pro Kit
products.description: Tools to keep cinema lenses spotless on set.
products.fullDescription: Includes air blower, microfiber cloths, swabs, and solution in a rugged pouch.
products.story: Keeps glass clean when moving fast between shots.

products.name: Storyboard Notebook
products.description: Dot-grid notebook for shot planning and blocking notes.
products.fullDescription: Thick paper, lay-flat binding, and shot template pages to sketch frames and camera moves.
products.story: Lencho’s pocket notebook for pre-production walkthroughs.

products.name: Studio Headphones
products.description: Closed-back monitoring for music and dialog.
products.fullDescription: Flat response, comfortable pads, detachable cable, and foldable design for travel.
products.story: Chosen for playback on Lencho’s music video sets.
